definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
(of a person) honorable/not devious/(of a behavior) fair and aboveboard/without tricks/openly/(of a situation) out in the open
open and candid (idiom); straightforward and upright
to shine brightly/(fig.) to show promise/to be on the up and up
New Guangming district of Shenzhen City 深圳市[Shen1 zhen4 shi4], Guangdong
bright star/name of North Korean space satellite
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡

sentences.english: Light abolishes darkness merely by showing you it is not there.
sentences.chinese: 光明只要讓你看到黑暗並不存在。

sentences.english: It is our light, and not our darkness, that frightens us.
sentences.chinese: 我們對自己的光明面，而非黑暗面，感到恐懼。

sentences.english: But light struggled with dark in Nixon's soul.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光明與黑暗的對決卻蟄伏於他的內心深處。

sentences.english: Face the light or lurk in darkness.
sentences.chinese: 面對光明，或藏伏在黑暗裏。

sentences.english: Darkness and light are the same to You” (Psalm 139:7-12 TEV).
sentences.chinese: 黑暗和光明，在你看都是一樣。

sentences.english: They will become the "torch carriers" for China-ASEAN friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他們將成爲中國和東盟友誼薪火相傳的光明使者。

sentences.english: Do you think that politician is on the up-and-up?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得那位政客的所作所爲是否光明磊落？

sentences.english: Love is blind but marriage is an eye-opener.
sentences.chinese: 愛情讓人盲目，而婚姻則讓人重獲光明。

sentences.english: The cause of human progress has a bright prospect in the new century.
sentences.chinese: 在新的世紀裏，人類的進步事業具有光明的前景。

sentences.english: Jewish people celebrate the holiday of Hanukkah.
Please speak English when you come to Guangming Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 一進入光明小學，請說英語。

sentences.english: The polycentric world into which we are moving will not be all sweetness and light.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在進入的多中心世界不完全都是甜蜜而光明的。

sentences.english: Even those who question faith think twice about crossing the priesthood .
sentences.chinese: 即使是那些問題三番兩次超越光明的信仰。

sentences.english: Henry ford envisaged an important future for the motorcar.
sentences.chinese: 亨利福特爲汽車設想了光明的遠景。

sentences.english: The movie Titanic is recording good in Guangming Cinema.
sentences.chinese: 影片《鐵達尼號》在光明影片院十分賣座。

sentences.english: The man had a keen sense of justice and fair play.
sentences.chinese: 此人具有強烈的正義感，做事光明磊落。

definition: (of the sunlight) to bathe all things/to shine gloriously
dawn/fig. the dawn of a new era
